turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is it possible to order a Black and White Mocha with whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am happy to help.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I order a grande Black and White Mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. Would you like that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whip cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please make sure that they only use whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will note it on your cup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add anything else to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Thank you though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there one on Foothill?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are two on Foothill. Would you like the one near Grand or Central?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one near Central please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I will submit your order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: About how long will it be before my order is reeady?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check with the Starbucks store.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order should be ready in 20 minutes. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please verify my order for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You have ordered a grande iced Black and White Mocha made with whole milk and with whip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can help you with.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Thank you though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good day.
